status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2018-08-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08002
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 9711, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION ACT" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to supplement the FDA law (RA9711) by having a single unit dedicated to the screening, evaluation and processing of technical documents and other regulatory requirements for the traditional medicine (TM) and herbal supplement (HS) products. Proposes to create the CENTER FOR TRADITIONAL AND ALTERNATIVE MEDICINE exclusively devoted for these group of products under the FDA, which will streamline and expedite registration procedures to facilitate the release of product registration certificates.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, ARTHUR C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-02
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-09-06)2. Bravo (M.) (000 2018-09-18)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2018-08-08
